items.sentence: Can you think of anyone who would want to do this kind of thing?
Do you think parents should punish their children when they lie?
Tom\'s yearly salary has been the same for the past three years.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be aware of all the problems he\'s causing.
I\'ll help you with your French, if you help me with my English.
I\'m pretty sure Tom went outside before the gunshot, not after.
You\'d better hurry, otherwise you won\'t get there before dark.
You\'re the only one who ever really talked to Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'ve lost some weight, haven\'t you? Are you eating properly?
The earthquake was the biggest one that we had ever experienced.
